Package gui

Class CommandCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.CommandCenter
  • public class CommandCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines window where the game is being played, the player can see the crew status, commit actions, view spaceship status, and visit outpost

    • Field Summary

      Crew's shopping cart

      Crew's shopping cart's total price

      Label showing all the crew number of actions left

      List of buttons to specify which crew member to take action next

      Engine that runs and keeps track of the game state

      List of previously dead crew members

      List of selected crew members, maximum is 2

      Label showing currently selected item

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addCrewToSelection​(int index)
      Informs the game engine which crew is in selection
      void closeWindow()
      Closes window
      void finishedWindow()
      Closes window
      private void getInputCrewConsume​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> consumables)
      Displays consumables user has in inventory and waits for user's input to select which consumable to use
      private void getItemDescription​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Gets description of item on the visit outpost page
      private void initialize()
      Sets up command center display
      void loadGameState()
      Loads the game
      private void refreshCrewButtons​(javax.swing.JPanel commitActions)
      Checks if crew member is dead if so do not display in commit actions page
      private void refreshCrewStatusPage()
      Updates the crew statuses and end of each day and after any actions
      private void refreshInventory()
      Updates the inventory label
      private void refreshPage()
      Refreshes the labels on the bottom of command center Updates the current ship pieces found, current day count, current money and whether the planet has a ship piece or not
      private void refreshSelectedCrews()
      If there's more than 2 crew members selected, unselect the first crew member
      private void refreshSpaceshipPage()
      Updates space ship shield levels label
      private void showItemDetails​(java.lang.String item)
      Displays the details of a specific item on the outpost
      void startDay()
      Start the day and gets random event to occur, 1/3 chance of no event, 1/3 chance of Alien Pirates, 1/3 chance of Space Plague
